cause.description:
Our cast for our school's production of Urinetown the Musical is going to Scotland to perform at the Fringe in Edinburgh, and could use your help for a few bucks to help spot our travel fees.
1. Appreciation for the arts
2. Love for Musical Theatre and all kinds of theatre ROCKS
3. It's educational!!!
cause.mission: Send the Conservatory a packin' to AHSTF
cause.name: Get Urinetown to Scotland
